snippet: The United States women’s team romped past Switzerland, 10-0, in the semifinals of the world championship in Burlington, Vt., setting up a final Saturday against Canada.
abstract: United States women’s hockey team romps past Switzerland, 10-0, in the semifinals of the world championship in Burlington, Vt., setting up a final against Canada; the two teams have met in every final in the event’s history, with Canada holding a 9-4 edge.
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s team romped past Switzerland, 10-0, in the semifinals of the world championship in Burlington, Vt., setting up a final Saturday against Canada.
